definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ge 30:14 mandrake (as love-producing, cf. Di Ge 30:14)—pl. [[דּוּדָאִים]] (cf. Ew:189 g Sta§§ 301. 122) Ge 30:14, Ct So 7:13; cstr. [[דּוּדָאֵי]] Ge 30:14 + 3 t.;—mandrakes, as exciting sexual desire, and favouring procreation Ge 30:14, Ge 30:14, Ge 30:15, Ge 30:15, Ge 30:16 (J); also Ct So 7:13 where odour referred to. On [[דּוּדָאֵי]] Je 24:1 vessels, baskets, v. [[דּוּד]].
